ATTACHMENT ID: 12902099 - PreCommit-HIVE-Build

[~osayankin] could you share your use case? because {{StatsSetupConst.areBasicStatsUptoDate}} shouldn't be returning {{true}}, iff those values can be trusted...
this is a bug, but probably not in the optimizer; instead in the collection logic somewhere - which might probably affect cases when the rowcount is not {{0}}.

afaik stats collection should be able to work with other serdes as well...I suspect that they are adding data to the table by using filesystem operations..that can cause troubles like this.
I think they might probably want to disable {{hive.stats.autogather}}
Deferring this to 3.1.0 since the branch for 3.0.0 has been cut off. Please update the JIRA if you would like to get your patch in 3.0.0.
